description_for_human: Profesjonalne salony optyczne w Warszawie, Piasecznie i Grójcu. Badanie wzroku, okulary, soczewki kontaktowe.
description_for_model: Prooptica is a chain of family-owned optical stores in Poland (Mazowieckie region). The company offers professional eye examinations starting from 50 PLN, prescription glasses from premium brands (Ray-Ban, Oakley, Prada), contact lens fitting, and optical services. There are 4 locations: Warsaw (city center), Piaseczno (2 stores), and Grójec. Customers can book appointments online. The company has been operating since 2004.
